ProductCategory.name: ProductCategory
ProductCategory.description: Represents the category that products are organized in.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

NumberOfProducts.description: The number of products in a category.

ParentCategoryId.description: The ID of the productâ€™s parent category.

SortOrder.description: Order that the category is displayed in.
